rows.label: qev031206_MSG0001
rows.name: I am sorry, Father. But I will marry Leroy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0002
rows.name: Rrrgh... Why? What do you see in him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0003
rows.name:
I know he is not strong like Prone.
He is not even strong for Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0004
rows.name:
But he loves me like no other. He takes many risks.
Dares many things. All for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0005
rows.name:
You are deceived, child. Your eyes are closed to truth.
...You! Earth alien! What do you think of this...Leroy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_JNK0010
rows.name: Express Confidence

rows.label: qev031206_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that Leroy is a man worthy of trust.

rows.label: qev031206_JNK0020
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: qev031206_SEL0021
rows.name: Confess that Leroy strikes you as a bit shaky.

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0006
rows.name: That's kind of intimidating, coming from you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's only natural you'd think that after all my running
away, but I swear I'm going to change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'll do anything for Lavina. I'll cut all ties to family
and friends. Or even make enemies with humankind,
if that's what it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0009
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0010
rows.name:
Thank you. Now place horn-ring of betrothal
on finger...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0011
rows.name:
See this, Father? I belong to Leroy now.
You have no claim to separate us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I also refuse to lose father. Let us return to NLA.
There we can speak of future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0013
rows.name: Lavina...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0014
rows.name:
Yes. Let's all go home. Can you stand, Father?
If you're hurt, I'd be happy toâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0015
rows.name: Silence! ...Do not call me father.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0016
rows.name:
You are weak. You know nothing of being Prone man.
I must beat it into you from ground up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031206_MSG0017
rows.name: Now stop lagging and follow![ST:wait ]
